A

addGlobalHandler(PagedInventoryClickHandler) - Method in class com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.InventoryRegistrar
Add a global click handler Whenever any paged inventory gets clicked the specified PagedInventoryClickHandler.handle(PagedInventoryClickHandler.Handler) will be called The global handler is called before the paged inventory specific handler(s)
addGlobalHandler(PagedInventoryCloseHandler) - Method in class com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.InventoryRegistrar
Add a global close handler Whenever any paged inventory gets closed the specified PagedInventoryCloseHandler.handle(PagedInventoryCloseHandler.Handler) will be called The global handler is called before the paged inventory specific handler(s)
addGlobalHandler(PagedInventorySwitchPageHandler) - Method in class com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.InventoryRegistrar
Add a global switch page handler Whenever any player switches pages the specified PagedInventorySwitchPageHandler.handle(PagedInventorySwitchPageHandler.Handler) will be called The global handler is called before the paged inventory specific handler(s)
addHandler(PagedInventoryClickHandler) - Method in interface com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.IPagedInventory
Add a click handler
addHandler(PagedInventoryCloseHandler) - Method in interface com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.IPagedInventory
Add a close handler
addHandler(PagedInventorySwitchPageHandler) - Method in interface com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.IPagedInventory
Add a switch page handler
addPage(Inventory) - Method in interface com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.IPagedInventory
Add an inventory to the end of this paged inventory
addPage(Map<Integer, ItemStack>, String, int) - Method in interface com.tchristofferson.pagedinventories.IPagedInventory
Add a new inventory to the end of this paged inventory
